itunes:title: Episode 507 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/19/19 - Hitting That Monster Parlay!
title: Episode 507 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/19/19 - Hitting That Monster Parlay!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Ross going perfect in NFL picks last week including hitting two 4 team parlays, the Tua injury that rocked Bama, the upcoming Fight Game of the year between Ohio State and Penn State, why the Dallas Mavericks are a...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Ross going perfect in NFL picks last week including hitting two 4 team parlays, the Tua injury that rocked Bama, the upcoming Fight Game of the year between Ohio State and Penn State, why the Dallas Mavericks are a blast to watch, why the ladies of Arizona State deserve better, how the Houston Rockets are making it work between Harden and Westbrook, and this week's spreads for college football and NFL.
